subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Howard hit the tie-breaking homer in the top of the eighth inning on Tuesday as the major leaguers defeated a team of Japanese stars, 7-2, to take a 4-0 lead in the five-game series.
snippet: Ryan Howard hit the tie-breaking homer in the top of the eighth inning on Tuesday as the major leaguers defeated a team of Japanese stars, 7-2, to take a 4-0 lead in the five-game series.
